text: Balo -- ''ami ki mahakasamandala o prthibira adi-srasta allah byatita an'yake murabbirupe grahana karabo, athaca tini kha'oyana, kinta tamke kha'oyano haya na.’’ Balo -- ''ami niscaya'i adista hayechi yena yara a‌tmasamarpana kare tadera madhye ami agrani ha'i.’’ Ara tumi musarikadera antarbhukta hayo na.
